TopicTitle: Bug parts menu shows wrong state initially

Articles.Content:
When right clicking on a part, the menu shows the wrong state initially.
Clicking on the part in the menu does work as expected.

AMD Ryzen 9 3950X
64 GB DDR4-3600
AMD RX 5700
openSUSE Tumbleweed, KDE Plasma (Xorg)

Proton Experimental
Launch Options: PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 %command%

Version 0.1.0.0.20892
